and let us focus on more business

I'm with ivtech Community College I'm

ivytech is a bit different when it comes

one of the largest higher ed

was the day that we signed up with AWS
and red shift and really fell in love

uh we got answers to our questions

generally speaking a student falls
within one of those two pretty quickly
and this data involves everything that a

our student management system our
learning management system it's Network

the back end we can determine a

Innovative in a few different ways one
way is it lets our folks focus on things

flexible try out ideas in the case of
red shift specifically it's so fast now
we can ask questions we never would have
asked before that's a game changer
because now we can start asking what if
questions well what if I did it this way
what if I looked at it that way and we
can actually get the answer back and be
more interactive with your data when it
takes 40 minutes to ask a question you
don't ask a lot of questions when you
